destinations.name: 3d model of a house
destinations.description: Hi everyone! I've been doing 3D modeling for two years and during this time, I've created many projects. I’d like to share one of my works in Blender with you. It’s the result of a lot of effort and experiments. I hope you like it and get inspired!

destinations.name: 3D model "stone man"
destinations.description: Hi, we are a professional 3d modeling company. This is one of our works, in it you can see how we tried to make a gloomy atmosphere. Check it out!

destinations.name: 3D model of a tank
destinations.description: Hi, I made this model in just a few days. It is so WW2, it looks serious and intimidating, that's what I tried to pedede, the model is very detailed, take a look for yourself!
